com.pasdam.regexren.gui.rules

Class InsertTextBeforeAfterFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pasdam.regexren.gui.rules.AbstractRuleFactory
      • com.pasdam.regexren.gui.rules.InsertTextBeforeAfterFactory

  • public class InsertTextBeforeAfterFactory
extends AbstractRuleFactory

    AbstractRuleFactory used to create rule to insert a text before/after a specific pattern

    To set the operation type, use one of the folloting fields:

    • BEFORE_ALL
    • BEFORE_FIRST
    • BEFORE_LAST
    • AFTER_ALL
    • AFTER_FIRST
    • AFTER_LAST
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    paco

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int AFTER_ALL
      Used to insert after all occurrence of input text
      static int AFTER_FIRST
      Used to insert after only the first occurrence of input text
      static int AFTER_LAST
      Used to insert after only the last occurrence of input text
      static int BEFORE_ALL
      Used to insert before all occurrence of input text
      static int BEFORE_FIRST
      Used to insert before only the first occurrence of input text
      static int BEFORE_LAST
      Used to insert before only the last occurrence of input text
      static int PARAMETER_BEFORE_PATTERN
      Index of the "beforePattern" parameter
      static int PARAMETER_MATCH_CASE
      Index of the "matchCase" parameter

      Index of the "regex" parameter
      static int PARAMETER_TEXT_TO_INSERT
      Index of the "text to insert" parameter
      static int PARAMETER_TEXT_TO_SEARCH
      Index of the "textToSearch" parameter
      static int PARAMETERS_COUNT
      Indicates how many parameters this component has

        public boolean isRegex()
        Returns true if the pattern is a regular expression, false if it is a literal pattern

        true if the pattern is a regular expression, false if it is a literal pattern

      • setRegex

        public void setRegex(boolean regex)
              throws InvalidParametersException
        Sets whether the specified pattern is a regular expression or a literal pattern
        Parameters:
        regex - if true the pattern will be used as a regular expression, as a literal pattern if false
        Throws:
        InvalidParametersException - if one ore more parameters are invalid

      • getRule

        public static Rule getRule(java.lang.String textToInsert,
                           int beforeAfter,
                           java.lang.String textToSearch,
                           boolean regex,
                           boolean matchCase)
                    throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        This method based on the parameters values return the configured rule
        Parameters:
        textToInsert - - text to insert
        beforeAfter - - this sets where to insert text; use class fields to set this
        textToSearch - - text/regex near which insert text
        regex - - this flag indicates that textToSearch is a regular expression
        matchCase - - if true textToSearch is case sensitive
        Returns:
        the configured rule, based on input parameters
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if beforeAfter is invalid, or one of textToInsert or textToSearch is null or empty
